steps.action: Press “Win + E” keys, open File Explorer, go to the folder where “cmdextension.msi” locates
In file explorer, click on “File -> Open Windows PowerShell -> Open Windows PowerShell as administrator”
Wait 5 minutes and logout (don’t turn off the device)
Wait another 5 minutes and login back
Wait another 5 minutes, logout and login as another user

Open file explorer, go to %ProgramData%\Microsoft\CMDExtension\Logs. 
Open “CMDExtension.log”
steps.expected:
Verify agent was running by below contents’ timestamp.

·     “Plugin run scheduler with CMDAgentCommunicationChannel:” - should be printed every 20 seconds during logout period.

steps.action:
Test Cleanup:

In the same powershell window as “Step 4”, run command: msiexec /x cmdextension.msi
